summary: Infect NPCÂ´s with Sanguinare Vampiris just like vanilla vampires infected you! There is two ways to infect people: Sleeping Infection and Combat Infection! Requires Dawnguard!
descriptionHtml:
SANGUINARE VAMPIRIS
By: TheSkoomaKing
[color=red]Requires Dawnguard[/color]

if you like the mod please dont forget to endorse!

[img]http://www.fildirekt.se/dl/1361602571.png[/img]

Have you ever felt that it is strange that you can get infected by another vampire hitting you
and you cannot do the same to others? WELL this change that! 


With this mod you can now infect others with Sanguinare Vampiris disease. There is two ways of infecting 
other NPCS:

[color=red]Combat infection:[/color]
Each time you hit an NPC there is a 5% chance that they will contract Sanguinare Vampiris.

[color=red]Sleeping Infection:[/color]
If you activate the sleeping NPC you will have a third option ( Pickpocket---Sanguinare Vampiris---Feed)
pressing it will have a 100% chance of infecting the target.


Once the target is infected he/she has 3 days to find a cure, otherwise he will become an undead like yourself.
And the target also serves as a companion once it has turned! So you can then make them follow you or 
live in their house!

[color=red] ============================================================================================
New in Version 1.2:
[/color]
- Your turned npcs will now use vampire spells just like normal vampires!
- Fixed Instant version and it should now work properly!

[color=red] ===============================================================================================
[/color]
[color=red]IMPORTANT NOTE![/color]

due to the limited engine, in order for the script to work properly, you must be in the same cell as the target
during the time ( I know this sucks!!) As soon as i find a fix for this i will ofc fix it! If there is any
modder out there willing to help please feel free to PM me!

Because of this.. I have added another file, which makes the turn process instant! So once you bite the 
target while it sleeps, it will only take 2 seconds before he/she turns!

ofc this would be messed up with the Combat infection if that were instant, so i changed it so the 
combat infection will take one SKYRIM Hour ( 1 min irl ) before he/she turns.

[color=red]==============================================================================================
[/color]
[color=red]COMPATIBLE[/color]

This mod will conflict with any mod that alters the VampireFEED Perk. However since there are alot of great
vampire mods out there i decided to do a compatible version of some of them, atm Belua Sanguinare Revisted
is compatible [url]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17077[/url] note that you must use the special made 
esp found in the download section for it to work. 

As for Better Vampires by Brehanin. I THINK it should work, i am not a 100% sure but feel free to PM me if 
it does or if it does not and i will fix it asap!

If you want me to make Sanguinare Vampiris Compatible with YOUR mod, please feel free to PM me :)


[color=red]==============================================================================================
[/color]

[img]http://www.fildirekt.se/dl/1361642410.png[/img]
Bethesda Softwork for the Creation kit and Skyrim! 

I would like to give a special thanks to Eckss,Steve40 and MofoMojo. These 3 has provided invaluable scripting
help and is very appreciated!


And last but not least Myself, for being so god **** creative ^^


If you like this mod, perhaps you like my other mod:

Tame The Beasts of Skyrim:
[url]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28944/[/url]
author: TheSkoomaKing
